name: MOVE! (jucmaluco)
description:
Welcome, to MOVE! As said in the title, oh boy, you need to move! Its a hard game, so don't get angry! The theme, unstable, is related to the fact that in the game - everything is unstable/moving.

This is the first jam I take part in, so I'm sorry in case of any incoviniences! 

MOVEMENT: W A S D to move!
